alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 9:51AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of southeastern Camden County through 1015 AM EDT... At 951 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower capable of producing a landspout near Fernandina Beach, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kings Bay Base, High Point, Dungeness, Cumberland Island and Harrietts Bluff. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
